profile.name: mrdoob
profile.headline: Independent Software Engineer | WebGL & 3D Graphics Specialist | Creator of Three.js | Open Source Contributor
profile.about: I am an independent software developer with a profound passion for pushing the boundaries of interactive web experiences, particularly in 3D graphics. As the creator of Three.js, I have extensive hands-on experience in WebGL, JavaScript, and building high-performance, accessible libraries. My work focuses on developing innovative solutions, contributing to the open-source community, and exploring new frontiers in digital creativity.
